amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate on the acquisition of the next generation destroyer (DDX).

vote.text: Amendment SA 182 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 182 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lott. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2931) Expressing the sense of the Senate on the acquisition of the next generation destroyer (DDX).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 182 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 182 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lott.
